title: "Skyborg test flight sparks debate over whether military AI-guided machines may misbehave"
excerpt: "Florida’s Tyndall Air Force Base earlier this month made military history: the first full-length test of Skyborg, a groundbreaking artificial intelligence system that hitched a ride on a drone and performed “basic aviation capabilities” with only limited human involvement."
